CSSContainerRuleContainerName.summary: The read-only containerName property of the interface represents the container name of the associated CSS {{cssxref("@container")}} at-rule.

remarks.para: For example, the value of containerName for the @container below is sidebar:

CSSContainerRuleContainerName.value:
A string that contains the container-name of the {{cssxref("@container")}} associated with this .
If the _container is not named, the function returns the empty string ("").
